text: Below there are several questions. To answer them, drag each tile by its 6 dots into your workspace. Once in your workspace, the tiles will become editable.

1. Review the handout corresponding to the challenge you have chosen in your group.

Challenge A

Challenge B

{In this space, state which Challenge you chose. You can also use this space to take notes about the challenge and draft your memos.}
2. In the diagram tile in your workspace, build an app that will help Kenia solve the challenge

3. Write detailed modeling memos of your process.

{Write your answer here - If you have multiple memos, you can either put them all here, or use separate text tiles and label each one. Remember that Kenia will review your memos to help her decide on the winning app, so include lots of details and check your class guidelines to make sure you don't leave anything out!}
4. Bonus Task: You should only work on the bonus task corresponding to the challenge you have chosen.

5. Write a letter or design a poster/brochure that presents your work to Kenia. Your goal is to convince Kenia to choose your app using strong facts and evidence. Feel free to reference specific parts of your modeling memos as part of your evidence.

{Write your answer here. If you work in another program, such as google slides, you can put the URL to that spot here}
